DOC.brief_summary: To compare relative efficacy of intraarticular steroid injection using anatomic landmarks vs. fluoroscopy guided technique in decreasing knee osteoarthritis pain 1 month after the procedure.
DOC.brief_title: "Blind" vs. Fluoroscopy-Guided Steroid Injections for Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Adults with knee OA clinically deemed to qualify for steroid injection Children NonEnglish Speakers Pregant
